project.name: Castor
project.description: Castor is an Open Source data binding framework for Java[tm]. It's the shortest path between Java objects, XML documents and relational tables. Castor provides Java-to-XML binding, Java-to-SQL persistence, and more.

project.name: Commons Java Bean Utilities
project.description: BeanUtils provides an easy-to-use but flexible wrapper around reflection and introspection.

project.name: Commons Collections
project.description: Types that extend and augment the Java Collections Framework.

project.name: Commons Digester
project.description: The Digester package lets you configure an XML->Java object mapping module which triggers certain actions called rules whenever a particular pattern of nested XML elements is recognized.

project.name: Commons Logging
project.description: Commons Logging is a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to other, well known logging systems.

project.name: Xalan-Java
project.description: Xalan-Java is an XSLT processor for transforming XML documents into HTML, text, or other XML document types. It implements XSL Transformations (XSLT) Version 1.0 and XML Path Language (XPath).

project.name: Xerces2 Java Parser
project.description: Xerces2 is the next generation of high performance, fully compliant XML parsers in the Apache Xerces family.
